title: Security & Safety Audit - Full Stack Deep Dive
description: Comprehensive security audit of Experience Gifts PWA including: WebRTC P2P connections, Vercel Edge Functions, Upstash Redis, React frontend, all dependencies. Audit date: December 25, 2025.

title: CRITICAL: Verify React 19.2.3 is patched for CVE-2025-55182, CVE-2025-55183, CVE-2025-55184
description: React2Shell RCE vulnerability. React 19.2.3 SHOULD be safe but verify no RSC usage. CVEs: 55182 (RCE CVSS 10), 55183 (source exposure), 55184 (DoS). Check if app uses Server Components.
close_reason: Verified: React 19.2.3 is safe. CVEs affect RSC only, this app is client-only.

title: INFO: Google STUN servers have no authentication - IP exposure risk
description: stun.l.google.com:19302 is public, no auth. Users' public IPs exposed during WebRTC handshake. Google provides no TURN servers. For privacy-sensitive users, need self-hosted or commercial TURN relay.

title: HIGH: CORS wildcard allows any origin - restrict to production domain
description: API endpoints use Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * which allows any website to call the API. Should restrict to actual domain (experience-gifts.vercel.app) to prevent CSRF-like attacks.
close_reason: Fixed: CORS now restricted to production domain and localhost

title: HIGH: WebRTC IP address exposure - no TURN relay for privacy
description: WebRTC exposes real IP addresses of both players via STUN. Users behind VPNs will have IP leaked. Need TURN server for relay to prevent direct IP exposure between peers.

title: MEDIUM: Room codes are predictable 4-char - add rate limiting
description: 4-char codes (30^4 = 810,000 combinations) could be brute-forced. Add rate limiting to /api/signal/[code] endpoint to prevent enumeration attacks.
close_reason: Fixed: Added rate limiting (20/min create, 60/min signal)

title: MEDIUM: WebRTC DataChannel messages not validated
description: Game state messages via DataChannel are JSON.parse'd without schema validation. Malicious peer could send crafted payloads. Add validation for expected message types and game state structure.

title: LOW: localStorage stores booklet data unencrypted
description: Coupon booklet data stored in localStorage in plain JSON. Not a major risk for this app but could encrypt sensitive data if needed in future.

title: INFO: Verify Vite 7.3.0 is patched for directory traversal CVEs
description: Vite had CVE-2025-46565 (directory traversal), CVE-2025-30208 (file read). Vite 7.3.0 should include fixes. Only affects dev server with --host flag. Verify latest patches applied.

title: MEDIUM: Add SDP payload size limit (max 50KB)
description: SDP stored in Redis without size limits. Upstash free tier: 256MB storage, 500K commands/month. Attacker could exhaust storage. Add max 50KB validation per SDP payload. Upstash max request size: 10MB.
close_reason: Fixed: SDP size validation added (50KB max)

title: INFO: External service tier limits to monitor
description: Upstash Free: 256MB storage, 500K cmds/month, 200GB bandwidth. Vercel Hobby: 1M edge requests/month, 100GB bandwidth, 25s function timeout. Google STUN: free but no SLA, may throttle. No TURN = no relay fallback.
